EmailTemplate.name: IOP - Closing
EmailTemplate.subject: Master Administrator Claim
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Contact}, Regarding Company: {!Case.Account}
Unfortunately the information provided in regards to the Master Administrator change has not proved ownership of this account. We still require additional documents that prove you have legal right to the Intuit Online Payroll subscription. No changes will be made at this time. To continue your claim please send the following documents so that we may verify this:
Include the following information on the email / fax cover sheet:
Case# {!Case.CaseNumber} Company ID: {!Account.Company_ID__c} Company Name: {!Case.Account
Fax # is (888) 655-3373
Email: QBOE_Efax@intuit.com
We are closing your case for now. However, the claim will be reopened if you fax/email the documentation requested in this email within the next 30 days.
Sincerely,
The Intuit Online Payroll Support Team
